reviews.sentence: Great hotel for the price. it is much nicer than more expensive hotels in the area. The champagne at check in was a nice touch too.
Reasonably price with superb service and comfort. Hands down on this boutique hotel in the suburb of Sunyvale. Fast service with a personal touch. Room was clean with comfortable sleep number beds.

Great price clean hotel. I stayed for a concert. Breakfast is not included for hotelcom guest. Which you do not find out until a 36 bill is handed to you. The bathroom needs some help. I showered at home. The tub was screaming for a makeover. The manager waived the bill and I was happy. I would stay here a million more times. I loved the staff the room and the location.

Very good hotel for business trips in Silicon Valley. This hotel has a very modern feel the rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff are courteous and attentive. The location is quiet and central to many of the tech companies in Silicon Valley but is otherwise a little bland. Fortunately they have ample free parking so you can easily use a car to get around. Overall this is a great hotel for the price. My only complaint is that the breakfast buffet is expensive at 17. There are two Starbucks within walking distance of the hotel so if breakfast is not included with your room I recommend going to one of those. Sad when Starbucks is the cheap option.

One of the best Hotels in El Camino Real. Very good value for money if considering the crazy prices in the Silicon Valley. Nice room and confortable bed. Only one negative comment on the heater so noisy that is quite impossible to use it while inside the room. I will come back.

Standard hotel in Silicon Valley with poor quality price ratio. The bed was comfortable and adjustable. The room was large and you had plenty of space and also it was pretty clean1. The main problem was the temperature in the room. It was pretty cold outside and I had to use the heater. However the system is very noisy you can not even hear the other person on the phone when the heater is turned on. As such I could not use it during the night and in the morning it was very cold in the room around 60F. 2. Another problem was the location of the room next to the restaurant and every morning starting with 60 AM. it was very noisy and it smelled like greasy food. 3. The water pressure in the bathroom was very low you could barely use the sink faucet. 4. The internet connection was not working at all and the reception staff could not help. I had to spend almost half an hour on the phone with a rude person from IT to get it to work. 5. The walls seem pretty thin. One evening my neighbor was watching a movie and I could not sleep because of the noise coming from his room. 6. Are all hotels in Silicon Valley this pricey. The price is way too large for the services offered.

Really modern upscale feel that is still fun. The room was very comfortable and the separate living room with king size sleep number bed is great. Friendly staff and free parking WiFi is nice. Definitely recommend this place if you can get a decent rate.

Nice hotel with reasonable price. pretty good hotel price was pretty reasonable too the only thing I will say is not really well is the bathroom hot water. Need to run at least 5 mins to get hot water and not really hot.

The Domain Hotel Santa Clara. The property was clean. The parking was very good. The staff was extremely courteous. The breakfast was good. Location was within walking distance of other good places to dine. The room rate was very reasonable.
Nice hotel for the price. Pool and hot tub area was very nice.

Domain is a very nice hotel. I stayed one night in a room with a king size bed on the first floor Room 139 near the Byte atrium restaurant. The room was large with a good sized bathroom. The king size bed was a sleep number bed. Room included a living room chair desk and chair and 47 ” TV. Room was very clean. The price was good too although they initially charged my credit card an extra 50 more as a security deposit upfront. The receipt next morning showed they did not charge the 50. Waiting for Monday to verify my credit card final charge does not include the extra 50 charge.

Our Place to Get Some Sun. I was very surprised to learn that the new management has instituted a parking charge. I do not think of this as a site that would do that. I would rather it just be added to the room and then I can decide whether I want to pay that much or not. Secondly we could not get into our room without having our keys reprogramed. Third the checked in about 220 pm. Down the hall from our room were some dishes left outside of the room. Those dishes were still there at 10 pm. at night. Pool could have been cleaner. We come here every summer and we will probably do so again. It was just a little surprising this time. Breakfast is good. Small hotel so sometimes the noise carries.

terrible. I booked the hotel very early that is probably why the price is cheap. when I got there on the date which I was supposed to check in. I was there around 130AM I asked the receptionist that if they have available room to check in she said that early check in need to be charged 75 dollars the room fee just 105 per night when I booked that is definitely way too much for early check in I also did early check in in other hotels but they just charge me 25 which is acceptable. The internet there really sucks disconnection occurred very frequently what is more the speed is very slow as well. The worst thing is that the first night around 430AM someone just walked in the room on the second floor room as we stay in the first floor we can not fall asleep but we had to get up very early. Anyhow will never come back there again do not recommend that hotel for any guests it is not worth it.

The Domain was a perfectly casual little hotel for a multi night stay. it is conveniently located. The amenities are a little rough be prepared to pay for wifi and parking. The beds are comfortable and the room was very clean. There are small keurigs in each room so if you wake up early you will have some coffee available.
Excellent. I will not stay here again. I was unaware of the parking charge of 12 per day. They own the property and there is plenty of parking. This to me is a greedy gouge.

Meh. You should be able to do better for yourself at this same price point. It is a reskin of some older hotel or apartment building when it really needed to he a gut remodel. Trying to be modern but reads as dated and kind of sad.
room is okay but they might charge the credit card without any notification. Nothey charge the credit card without notification.

no very happy about this place for cost. wall paper was peeling off in the bathroom. crack titles around the tub. one of the lights was burnt out in the bathroom. the furniture looked like it was from Ikea and that was in the suite. plus the pool was out of service.

You get less value. 2 stars mainly for the very low value you get from this Hotel. Rooms need major update. It just feel below par compared to other Hotels in the area I do frequently travel to the area. No free breakfast. and they charge 12 night for parking which is a bit of a stretch for Hotel located on El Camino. I would expect a valet service for that price. For the price there are a dozen other Hotels in the area that offer much higher value.

Fair Stay. Cleanliness smelled amazing in the lobby close to my destination for my trip. Infused water and complimentary fruit. Sleep Number bed did n’t work staff did n’t let us know there was an option to have a regular bed until after we checked out. Asked to have a room on a upper level and was told that the levels upstairs were being remodeled and there was no one upstairs on the Lower level of the hotel was opened. Lots of noise from the rooms upstairs could hear neighbors conversation and phone constantly going off. Wanted an upper level for this reason. Had to pay for continental breakfast. Particular staff that helped us was very nonchalant about our concerns about the bed came here for a relaxing vacation.
